text: Vikki Breese-Iverson is an American politician and businesswoman serving as a member of the Oregon House of Representatives. A Republican, she represents 55th district, which includes Prineville in Eastern Oregon. == Career == She joined the 80th Oregon Legislative Assembly after being appointed on August 8, 2019 to replace Mike McLane. She owns a real estate business in Prineville. She had previously worked for former Oregon State Senator Ted Ferrioli and former Oregon State House Speaker Karen Minnis. == Personal life == Breese- Iverson grew up in Central Oregon. She owns a ranch with her husband and has two sons. ==References== Category:Year of birth missing (living people) Category:Living people Category:Members of the Oregon House of Representatives Category:Oregon Republicans
title: Vikki Breese-Iverson
